basics.name: Erica Gogel
basics.label: Flight Attendant
basics.summary: Dedicated and adaptable professional with experience in aviation, healthcare, and funeral services. Skilled in customer service, safety procedures, specimen handling, and compassionate support in high‑stress environments.

work.name: Delta Air Lines
work.summary: Ensure passenger safety and provide exceptional in‑flight service while maintaining compliance with airline regulations.
highlights: Conduct pre‑flight safety checks and demonstrate safety procedures.
Respond to in‑flight emergencies and passenger needs.
Provide high‑quality customer service, including meal service and seating assistance.
Maintain cabin cleanliness and enforce airline policies.
Communicate effectively with flight crew to ensure smooth operations.

work.name: Castillo Funeral Home & Cremation
work.summary: Supported funeral operations, assisted families, and ensured respectful handling of services and facilities.
highlights: Prepared venues and arranged floral tributes for funeral services.
Provided compassionate support to grieving families.
Handled transportation and preparation of the deceased.
Maintained facilities and assisted with administrative tasks and paperwork.

work.name: Promedica
work.summary: Collected and processed biological specimens while ensuring accuracy, safety, and regulatory compliance.
highlights: Collected, labeled, and processed blood, urine, and tissue samples.
Ensured proper handling and storage to maintain specimen integrity.
Verified patient information to prevent identification errors.
Followed safety protocols and maintained a clean laboratory environment.

work.name: Kingston Rehabilitation Center
work.summary: Assisted patients with daily living activities and supported nursing staff in delivering quality care.
highlights: Assisted patients with bathing, dressing, eating, and mobility.
Assisted nurses with repositioning patients and changing linens.
